title: How to see all your chatbot threads using OpenAI's platform
description: How to see all your chatbot threads using OpenAI's platform

body.raw: Unlock the full potential of your OpenAssistantGPT chatbot by mastering thread management. This comprehensive guide provides step-by-step instructions on how to view and manage threads created by your chatbot, enhancing user interaction and efficiency. ## How to enable threads in Openai platform? Begin by navigating to your OpenAI platform [settings](https://platform.openai.com/account/organization). Under "Features and Capabilities," find and adjust settings to activate the thread management feature. This image illustrates where to locate and activate new thread options in the OpenAI platform settings. Upon enabling thread features, a new option will appear in your sidebar, allowing quick access to all threads. This image showcases the sidebar update, revealing the newly added threads tab in the OpenAI platform. By following these steps, you can efficiently manage and view all threads generated by your chatbot, ensuring a smoother and more engaging user experience. Enhance your chatbot's performance and user interaction today with OpenAI's thread management features.
